name: Anton H. BROCKELMAN, Jr., Appellee, v. Jacques HATTER, Hatter Coal Company, Inc., and Sherman Coal Company, Appellants

parties: Anton H. BROCKELMAN, Jr., Appellee, v. Jacques HATTER, Hatter Coal Company, Inc., and Sherman Coal Company, Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NIGRO, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
694 A.2d 618
Anton H. BROCKELMAN, Jr., Appellee, v. Jacques HATTER, Hatter Coal Company, Inc., and Sherman Coal Company, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 17, 1996.
Decided June 19, 1997.
